Format: string1 ne string2, or string1 NE string2
Languages: ALGOL 68 – note: the operator "ne" is literally in bold type-font.
BASIC, VB, VB .NET, Pascal, Object Pascal (Delphi), OCaml, PHP, Seed7, Standard ML, F#, COBOL, Cobra, Python 2 (deprecated)
C++ (STL), C#, Go, JavaScript (not similar), PHP (not similar), Python, Ruby, Rust,[9] Swift, D, Mathematica

Format: test string1 != string2, or [ string1 != string2 ]
for(size_t i = 0, len = strlen(string); i< len; i++) string[i] = toupper(string[i]); for (char *c = string; *c != '\0'; c++) *c = toupper(*c);
translate(string), or UPPER variables, or PARSE UPPER VAR SrcVar DstVar
